header.name: Betatron Cleaning Inefficiency 7TeV Beam 1
header.desc: Betatron cleaning inefficiecies resulting in proton losses on the TCTV at 7TeV for Beam 1
header.misc: Vertical halo, full geometrical orbit, no beam orbit, beam lifetime 30h: ProtLossProbPerTurn = 1/(LifeTime*BunchFreq) = 8.2341e-10, ProtLossFractionOnTct = ProtOnTct/ProtSim = 9.262e-4, BeamProtInFile = LossSim/(ProtLossProbPerTurn*ProtLossFractionOnTct) = 7.8412e16
